test.create_query: CREATE TABLE table_ip_trie ( ip String, val Float32 ) ENGINE = TinyLog
INSERT INTO table_ip_trie SELECT IPv4NumToString(ipv4) || '/' || toString(rand() % 25 + 8) as ip, val FROM generateRandom('ipv4 UInt32, val Float32', 0, 30, 30) LIMIT 1000000
INSERT INTO table_ip_trie SELECT IPv6NumToString(ipv6) || '/' || toString(rand() % 113 + 16) as ip, val FROM generateRandom('ipv6 FixedString(16), val Float32', 0, 30, 30) LIMIT 2500000
CREATE DICTIONARY dict_ip_trie ( ip String, val Float32 ) PRIMARY KEY ip SOURCE(CLICKHOUSE(DB 'default' TABLE 'table_ip_trie')) LAYOUT(IP_TRIE()) LIFETIME(300)
CREATE TABLE dict_ip_trie_table ( `ip` String, `val` Float32 ) ENGINE = Dictionary(default.dict_ip_trie)
